mapper.insert: insert into shelter_registrations (id, applicant_id, reviewed_by, shelter_id, review_notes) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applicantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reviewedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shelterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reviewNotes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, applicant_id, reviewed_by, shelter_id, review_notes from shelter_registrations
